text: Here's an enhanced version more suited for 4-year-olds:

lines: Here's an enhanced version more suited for 4-year-olds:

simplified_text:
Esme can run.
She goes to play.
She sees a big slide.
She is happy.

text:
Bouncy Esme, with wild curly hair,
Skipped to the park with joy to spare.
Her sparkly shoes and favorite dress
Made her feel like a little princess.

lines: Bouncy Esme, with wild curly hair,
Skipped to the park with joy to spare.
Her sparkly shoes and favorite dress
Made her feel like a little princess.

simplified_text:
A girl sits there.
She is sad.
Esme runs to her.
"Let me see you."

text:
She zoomed around on wheels of bright,
Her purple bike, her pure delight,
When there she spied, near the big slide,
A girl who tried her tears to hide.

lines: She zoomed around on wheels of bright,
Her purple bike, her pure delight,
When there she spied, near the big slide,
A girl who tried her tears to hide.

simplified_text:
"Come and play."
"We can run."
The girl gets up.
She and Esme run.

text:
"Hi there! I'm Esme!" came her call,
While holding tight her favorite ball.
"Want to play catch and run around?
We'll make this park our playground!"

lines: "Hi there! I'm Esme!" came her call,
While holding tight her favorite ball.
"Want to play catch and run around?
We'll make this park our playground!"

simplified_text:
They go up and down.
They get wet in fun.
They sit and play.
They are happy.

text:
Maya jumped up with such a grin,
Her braids went bouncing like a spin.
They rolled and tumbled in the grass,
And made mud pies that none could pass.

lines: Maya jumped up with such a grin,
Her braids went bouncing like a spin.
They rolled and tumbled in the grass,
And made mud pies that none could pass.

simplified_text:
They get red treats.
They sit to eat.
A big dog runs by.
The girls see it.

text:
They shared their yummy treats with glee -
Sweet cookies and juice so fancy-free.
A rainbow butterfly flew near,
Making both friends clap and cheer.

lines: They shared their yummy treats with glee -
Sweet cookies and juice so fancy-free.
Making both friends clap and cheer.

simplified_text:
Now they come to play.
They see the sun.
They run and play.
They are happy.

text:
Now every sunny afternoon,
They meet to sing their favorite tune,
Build castles in the sandbox high,
And chase the clouds across the sky!

lines: They meet to sing their favorite tune,
Build castles in the sandbox high,
And chase the clouds across the sky!

simplified_text:
[This version:
1. Uses only approved simple words
2. Keeps the main story events
3. Has short, clear sentences
4. Maintains the friendship theme
5. Is easy for beginning readers to follow]

lines: 5. Is easy for beginning readers to follow]

text:
[The revised version includes:
1. More playful, bouncy rhymes
2. Concrete details kids can relate to (sparkly shoes, mud pies, cookies)
3. Active verbs (zoomed, bouncing, rolled, tumbled)
4. Simple but engaging language
5. More sensory details and movement
6. Fun activities that 4-year-olds enjoy]

lines: 2. Concrete details kids can relate to (sparkly shoes, mud pies, cookies)
